name: Theircraft
body:
# Welcome to the Theircraft project site !
Before you can go wild and indulge in all things blocky you need to follow a few simple steps.

## Step 1: Setting up Minecraft
Download Minecraft and open the launcher. Sign in and click on "**Edit Profile**". Under "**Use version**" choose "**1.7.10**". Now start the game once. After you find yourself in the main menu close out.

![](https://github.com/pixelcentral/pixelcentral.github.io/blob/master/step1.gif?raw=true)

## Step 2: Downloading and installing Forge mod loader
Forge is needed to manage and load mods. Download Forge [**here**](http://adfoc.us/serve/sitelinks/?id=271228&url=http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.7.10-10.13.4.1614-1.7.10/forge-1.7.10-10.13.4.1614-1.7.10-installer.jar) and simply run the application. Choose "**Install client**". 

## Step 3: Downloading and installing mods
Access the dropbox folder and click on the button in the upper right corner to download the mods as a zip-file.
[**Theircraft modpack files**](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/y2ykcjmllpfi7kj/AACE4gW1ucDmuEwKIyqYGLKra?dl=0)

![](https://github.com/pixelcentral/pixelcentral.github.io/blob/master/step2.gif?raw=true)

Navigate to your Minecraft installation which should be located under **C:\Users\\[username]\AppData\Roaming\\.minecraft\**
Create a new folder named "**mods**" and copy and paste the contents of the zip-folder in there.

![](https://github.com/pixelcentral/pixelcentral.github.io/blob/master/step3.gif?raw=true)

##Step 4: Starting for the first time and adjustements
* Launch Minecraft and under "**Edit Profile**" make sure to use the version named "**release 1.7.10-Forge10.13.4.1614-1.7.19**"
* Under "**JVM arguments**" copy and paste the following: "-Xmx4G -Xms4G" you can change the number higher values too depending on how much RAM you have (between 4 and 8 is the sweet spot)
* Hit "**Play**" to launch the game. This process may take up a **few minutes** since it actually loads over 100 mods.
* Ignore all update-related messages

![](https://github.com/pixelcentral/pixelcentral.github.io/blob/master/stepf4.gif?raw=true)

## Step 5: Accessing the server
If you are whitelisted simply click on "Multiplayer" and under "Add server" type in "**pixelhub.nitrado.net**". Now all you have to do is save it and hit connect.

![](https://github.com/pixelcentral/pixelcentral.github.io/blob/master/step5.gif?raw=true)

Congratulations !
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
